text: Anik ( also known as Master Anik) is a Bangladeshi film actor. He won Bangladesh National Film Award for Best Child Artist for the film Obujh Sontan (1993). ==Selected films== * Abujh Sontan - 1993 ==Awards and nominations== National Film Awards {| border="1" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 95%;" |- style="background:#ccc; text- align:center;" ! Year !! Award !! Category !! Film !! title: Anik (actor)
